sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"converter-class"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#converter-class"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Converter class`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The idea was to use ether as a base so whatever unit from it will be converter to ether as a base and then converted to whatever conversion unit.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`FROM --> ether --> TO`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The json object was created with the idea of get rid of the zeros via the exponential property. In that way we can deal with the conversion in an easier way.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The following cases were implemented to make the conversion. See methods evluateFrom, evaluateTo`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`From/To`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"center"}}>{`currency`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"right"}}>{`ether`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"right"}}>{`unit`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`currency`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"center"}}>{`x`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"right"}}>{`fromCurrencyToEther`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"right"}}>{`fromCurrencyToEther - fromEtherToUnits`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`ether`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"center"}}>{`fromEtherToCurrency`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"right"}}>{`x`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"right"}}>{`fromEtherToUnits`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`unit`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"center"}}>{`fromUnitsToEther - fromEtherToCurrency`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"right"}}>{`fromUnitsToEther`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"right"}}>{`fromUnitsToEther - fromEtherToUnits`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"issues"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#issues"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Issues`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Unfortunately, the converter has some known issues:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Better validations for numbers.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`The requested swicth functionality is missing.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
